title: Adventure Time
overview: Adventure Time (originally titled 'Adventure Time with Finn & Jake') follows two best friends: Finn (a 12-year old boy) and Jake (a wise 28-year-old dog with magical powers), and the surreal adventures undertaken by the duo as they traverse the mystical Land of Ooo. A world built for adventure, Ooo is filled to the brim with various landscapes for the two buddies to explore and bizarre characters to assist.

episodes.title: Finn the Human (2)
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake chase the Lich through a dimensional portal and meet a wishmaster. After the Lich wishes that humanity never existed, Finn wishes that the Lich never existed.

episodes.title: Jake the Dog (3)
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake chase the Lich through a dimensional portal and meet a wishmaster. After the Lich wishes that humanity never existed, Finn wishes that the Lich never existed.

episodes.title: Five More Short Graybles
episodes.overview: A series of short stories all centered around a common theme, hosted by a mysterious man named Cuber from the future.

episodes.title: Up a Tree
episodes.overview: The guys' game of catch goes awry when their throwing disc is lodged in a large tree.

episodes.title: All the Little People
episodes.overview: Finn receives a bag full of miniature versions of his friends.

episodes.title: Jake the Dad
episodes.overview: Jake's a daddy, but being a father and keeping his rainicorn pups from killing themselves or each other is a lot harder than he imagined.

episodes.title: Davey
episodes.overview: Finn creates an alter ego, Davey. Davey soon begins to take over, and Jake is forced into action to get his old friend back.

episodes.title: Mystery Dungeon
episodes.overview: Ice King, NEPTR, Tree Trunks, Shelby, and Lemongrab are trapped inside a mysterious dungeon and must work together to free themselves.

episodes.title: All Your Fault
episodes.overview: Princess Bubblegum sends Finn and Jake to investigate a message of distress from the Earls of Lemongrab.

episodes.title: Little Dude
episodes.overview: Finn's hat comes to life and becomes evil after it is touched by a wizard. Finn, Jake, and the wizard track the hat down, and manage to turn the hat good.

episodes.title: Bad Little Boy
episodes.overview: The princesses tire of Ice King’s crazy Fionna-and-Cake fan-fiction stories, so Marceline stops by the Ice Kingdom to show him how to properly write a story.

episodes.title: Vault of Bones
episodes.overview: When Flame Princess begins to doubt her evilness, Finn insists she is not evil and takes her on a journey into a dungeon to help her sort out her thoughts.

episodes.title: The Great Bird Man
episodes.overview: Xergiok, the former Goblin king who was deposed by Finn and Jake claims to have turned over a new leaf.

episodes.title: Simon and Marcy
episodes.overview: A look at what Ice King and Marceline were like 996 years ago.

episodes.title: A Glitch Is a Glitch
episodes.overview: The Ice King creates a computer virus that will delete everyone in Ooo except for him and Princess Bubblegum. Finn and Jake hack into the universal source code to destroy the virus.

episodes.title: Puhoy
episodes.overview: Finn dreams he is in a pillow world where he marries a pillow woman  and has two children with her.

episodes.title: BMO Lost
episodes.overview: BMO makes his way home after being snatched by an eagle. On its way, BMO meets Bubble and a baby, and the three decide to journey home together.

episodes.title: Princess Potluck
episodes.overview: Ice King gets super jealous when he finds out that he wasn't invited to the Princess Potluck.

episodes.title: James Baxter the Horse
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake stumble across a horse named James Baxter who has the ability to make sad people feel better.

episodes.title: Shh!
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake make a bet to see who can not talk the longest, and the two use signs to communicate.

episodes.title: The Suitor
episodes.overview: Peppermint Butler thinks that Bubblegum is working too hard in her lab, so he tries to get her a suitor.

episodes.title: The Party's Over, Isla de Señorita
episodes.overview: After another one of his schemes fails, the Ice King decides to give up.

episodes.title: One Last Job
episodes.overview: Jake Jr. gets involved with a group of troublemakers, and Jake is forced to reunite his old gang—which includes Tiffany who first appeared in the first season episode "My Two Favorite People"—to rescue his daughter.

episodes.title: Another Five More Short Graybles
episodes.overview: A series of short stories with a common theme, hosted by a mysterious man named Cuber from the future. In this entry, Finn and Jake build a time machine. Meanwhile, Princess Bubblegum helps Cinnamon Bun overcome his fear of the dark.

episodes.title: Candy Streets
episodes.overview: Lumpy Space Princess is robbed, but before she is able to explain the details to Finn and Jake, she faints.

episodes.title: Wizards Only, Fools
episodes.overview: After Starchy comes down with a cold and needs a magic cure, Finn, Jake, and Princess Bubblegum disguise themselves as wizards and sneak into Wizard City.

episodes.title: Jake Suit
episodes.overview: Jake gets upset with the amount of times that Finn uses his body as a suit of armor, so he convinces Finn to trade places with him.

episodes.title: Be More
episodes.overview: BMO accidentally deletes his core system files. Finn and Jake disguise themselves as MOs to infiltrate the MO factory and save BMO from a memory wipe.

episodes.title: Sky Witch
episodes.overview: Marceline tracks the Sky Witch, but finds out that she may need Princess Bubblegum's help.

episodes.title: Frost & Fire
episodes.overview: Flame Princess and the Ice King fight each other, prompting Finn to have an interesting dream.

episodes.title: Too Old
episodes.overview: Finn, Jake and Princess Bubblegum discover a talented mutant named Lemonhope at The Pageant of Mutants. Now they must find a way to free him from the lemongrabs.

episodes.title: Earth & Water
episodes.overview: Princess Bubblegum subjects Flame Princess to a series of tests to gauge Flame Princess' fiery tendencies. But when there's an emergency at the treehouse, and Princess Bubblegum leaves Cinnamon Bun to watch Flame Princess, her experiment might literally backfire in her face.

episodes.title: Time Sandwich
episodes.overview: Jake crafts the most delicious sandwich ever, but when Magic Man steals it, Finn must defy the laws of space and time to win back Jake's creation.

episodes.title: The Vault
episodes.overview: When Finn starts sleepwalking and dreaming about the Green Lady he filed away in his memory vault, Jake and BMO help him tap into his repressed memories to uncover a secret past. Who is the Green Lady? And how is she connected to Finn?

episodes.title: Love Games
episodes.overview: Slime Princess needs a husband or else she'll lose the Slime Kingdom to her obnoxious sis. Finn steps in to save the day, but first they will need to win a series of Love Games to prove to Slime Princess's dad that they are really in love. This is definitely not what Finn signed up for!

episodes.title: Dungeon Train
episodes.overview: All aboard! Finn and Jake discover a train where every car is a dungeon filled with a new foe for Finn to fight. Jake quickly gets bored and wants to leave, but Finn is having the best time and doesn't want to leave... ever!

episodes.title: The Box Prince
episodes.overview: Finn meets the Box Prince—a cat with a box on its back—and learns that the Box Kingdom has been taken over by an imposter. Finn must therefore help the real Box Prince reclaim the throne.

episodes.title: Red Starved
episodes.overview: Finn, Jake and Marceline are trapped in an underground cavern with no red in sight. If Marceline doesn't feed, like ASAP, she will turn into a vampiric beast and suck out all of Jake's blood! So, Finn heads off to explore the cave and find something red to satiate her until they can be rescued. But time is running out!

episodes.title: We Fixed a Truck
episodes.overview: Finn finds an old truck, and Jake calls Banana Man to help with the repairs. But when BMO stays up all night working on the truck, he hears on a spooky radio talk show that Princess Bubblegum is a reptilian replicant. Is it just another one of Starchy's crazy conspiracy theories, or a fact?

episodes.title: Play Date
episodes.overview: Sick and tired of babysitting Ice King while the Ice Kingdom is being rebuilt, Finn and Jake call up an old friend to hang out with their annoying houseguest: Abracadaniel.

episodes.title: The Pit
episodes.overview: Finn needs Lady Rainicorn's help to rescue Jake when he is kidnapped by Kee-Oth the Blood Demon.

episodes.title: James
episodes.overview: Finn, Jake, and Princess Bubblegum are attacked by nasty goo monsters in the Desert of Wonders.

episodes.title: Root Beer Guy
episodes.overview: Root Beer Guy works a boring job during the day and tries to write mystery stories at night. But his life is about to change when he witnesses Finn and Jake kidnapping Princess Bubblegum! There's only one problem: no one believes Root Beer Guy...

episodes.title: Apple Wedding
episodes.overview: Tree Trunks and Mr. Pig are celebrating the wedding of the year.

episodes.title: Blade of Grass
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake decide it's time for Finn to get a new sword. Finn reluctantly buys a grass sword from a mysterious old man, but the sword turns out to be cursed! And unfortunately for our hero, all sales are final.

episodes.title: Rattleballs
episodes.overview: Finn practices his sword fighting skills at the candy junkyard, where he meets an old gumball robot named Rattleballs. To Finn's shock, he finds out he's not the master swordsman he thinks he is. What the what?! Finn begs Rattleballs to train him, but he soon discovers his mentor's deep, dark secret... a secret that will ultimately test Finn's loyalty to Princess Bubblegum.

episodes.title: The Red Throne
episodes.overview: When Flame King breaks out of his prison and takes over the Flame Kingdom again, Flame Princess turns to the one person she believes she can trust... Finn! But will Finn be able to put his feelings for Flame Princess aside long enough to help her reclaim her throne?

episodes.title: Betty
episodes.overview: After a magic spell backfires, the Ice King reverts back to Simon, and seeks help from Finn, Jake, and Marceline in order to get Betty, his former fiancée, back.

episodes.title: Bad Timing
episodes.overview: Love is in the air when Lumpy Space Princess reconnects with an old classmate, but will her jealousy get in the way of finding true love?

episodes.title: Lemonhope (1)
episodes.overview: Tired of all of Princess Bubblegum's talk about "responsibility," Lemonhope yearns for true freedom. So he sets off on the greatest adventure of his lemony life.

episodes.title: Lemonhope (2)
episodes.overview: Though Lemonhope finds refuge from the desert with monster hunter Phlannel Boxingday, he might not be able to escape the ghosts of his past.

episodes.title: Billy's Bucket List
episodes.overview: Finn finds the hero Billy's bucket list and decides to complete the unfinished items as a final tribute.

episodes.title: Hot to the Touch
episodes.overview: Finn develops a crush on Flame Princess and tries to get to know her, which proves difficult due to her destructive power.

episodes.title: Five Short Graybles
episodes.overview: Follow as 5 stories intertwine together, can you find the connection?

episodes.title: Web Weirdos
episodes.overview: When Finn gets trapped in a giant spider web, he ends up playing marriage counselor to a couple of grumpy arachnids.

episodes.title: Dream of Love
episodes.overview: Tree Trunks is courted by an oinking suitor, but much to Jake’s dismay, this interferes with her baking habits.

episodes.title: Return to the Nightosphere (1)
episodes.overview: Marceline’s dad banishes Finn and Jake to the Nightosphere, and it stinks. Literally.

episodes.title: Daddy's Little Monster (2)
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake attempt to rescue Marceline and find out what's making her behave so strangely.

episodes.title: In Your Footsteps
episodes.overview: A bear cozies up to the guys, but his true intentions may be hidden.

episodes.title: Hug Wolf
episodes.overview: Finn goes through a transformation after a run-in with a hug wolf.

episodes.title: Princess Monster Wife
episodes.overview: Princesses lose body parts under mysterious circumstances.

episodes.title: Goliad
episodes.overview: Battling with her new realization of her own mortality, in a sleep deprived state Princess bubblegum creates her own heir to the throne. After meeting the heir, Finn and Jake decide to teach her the ways of the world.

episodes.title: Beyond This Earthly Realm
episodes.overview: When Finn finds a porcelain lamb, it transports him into the spirit world and only the Ice King can help get him out.

episodes.title: Gotcha
episodes.overview: In order to do research for her tell-all memoir about men, Lumpy Space Princess goes undercover working for Finn and Jake.

episodes.title: Princess Cookie
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake are called to solve a Candy Kingdom hostage crisis when a rogue cookie takes over.

episodes.title: Card Wars
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake play Card Quest, an epic game.

episodes.title: Sons of Mars
episodes.overview:
Magic man has most of his power taken from him by his brother, in a fit of desperation, he swaps the way Jake and Himself look.

Magic Mans brother takes Jake to Mars for punishment,

episodes.title: Burning Low
episodes.overview: Princess Bubblegum may be jealous when Finn start hanging out with Flame Princess.

episodes.title: BMO Noire
episodes.overview: BMO tries to find Finn's sock.

episodes.title: King Worm
episodes.overview: Finn has a vivid dream that may be more than it seems.

episodes.title: Lady & Peebles
episodes.overview: Princess Bubblegum and Lady Rainicorn look for Finn and Jake, who are missing after a run-in with the Ice King.

episodes.title: You Made Me!
episodes.overview: When a creepy sleep-peeping Lemongrab upsets Princess Bubblegum with his creepy ways, Finn and Jake need to tend to some issues in the Outer Realm.

episodes.title: Who Would Win?
episodes.overview: The guys challenge a monster to a fight but end up battling each other.

episodes.title: Ignition Point
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake sneak into the Fire Kingdom to retrieve Fire Princess' scented candles and overhear a plot to assassinate the king.

episodes.title: The Hard Easy
episodes.overview: Frog People seek protection from an evil lizard who's attacking their swamp.

episodes.title: Reign of Gunters
episodes.overview: The Gunters cause chaos in Ooo

episodes.title: I Remember You
episodes.overview: The Ice King and Marceline bond over song and memories.

episodes.title: The Lich (1)
episodes.overview: A visit from the Lich King sheds light on Ooo's secrets.

episodes.title: Conquest of Cuteness
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake must defend their home from the Cuties, a tiny race who believe themselves to be evil, destructive invaders.

episodes.title: Morituri te Salutamus
episodes.overview: The duo choose to partake in gladiatorial combat against the Fight King's ghost warriors, but Finn succumbs to bloodlust while Jake becomes obsessed in keeping a cool morale.

episodes.title: Memory of a Memory
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake enter Marceline's mind to awaken her from a sleep spell she had cast on herself, without knowing that they are being tricked by a person from her past.

episodes.title: Hitman
episodes.overview: The grounded Ice King hires a fire-manipulating hitman to attack Finn and Jake, without realizing the potentially deadly consequences.

episodes.title: Too Young
episodes.overview: The Earl of Lemongrab takes over the Candy Kingdom due to Princess Bubblegum's age regression, forcing her and Finn to try and get rid of him even if it means a life-altering decision.

episodes.title: The Monster
episodes.overview: The king and queen of Lumpy Space ask Finn and Jake to bring their daughter back home. At the same time, they attempt to stop a "monster" from destroying a village.

episodes.title: Still
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake are literally unable to move and are at the mercy of the Ice King.

episodes.title: Wizard Battle
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake enter a competition for wizards in disguise so they can prevent Ice King from winning the grand prize: a kiss from Princess Bubblegum.

episodes.title: Fionna and Cake
episodes.overview: In this gender-swapped episode, Fionna and Cake must battle the evil Ice Queen.

episodes.title: What Was Missing
episodes.overview: Finn and his friends must come together as a genuine band in order to open the gate of the Door Lord and get back their taken items.

episodes.title: Apple Thief
episodes.overview: When Tree Trunks's apples go missing, she, Finn and Jake descend into the dark side of the Candy Kingdom in order to find the thief.

episodes.title: The Creeps
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake receive an invitation to a masquerade dinner. It turns into a whodunit as guests start to meet their demise.

episodes.title: From Bad to Worse
episodes.overview: When another plague of Candy Zombies arises and Princess Bubblegum is among the undead, Finn and his friends are in a race against time to figure out how to stop it...without making things even worse!

episodes.title: Beautopia
episodes.overview: Susan Strong asks Finn and Jake to help fight off the Glub Glubs in the sewers below to regain her people's home in Beautopia.

episodes.title: No One Can Hear You
episodes.overview: Finn awakens after an accident to find the Candy Kingdom citizens mysteriously gone and Jake acting crazier than usual.

episodes.title: Jake vs. Me-Mow
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake take on a request to protect Wildberry Princess from an unknown assassin. The assassin turns out to be a tiny cat assassin called Me-Mow, who ends up bribing Jake by poisoning him.

episodes.title: Thank You
episodes.overview: The Snow Golem visits the Fire Kingdom and finds an unlikely follower.

episodes.title: The New Frontier
episodes.overview: Jake dreams about his death, and Finn takes action when events from the dream start to come true.

episodes.title: Holly Jolly Secrets (1)
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake find the Ice King's video diary and have a chance to unearth his secrets.

episodes.title: Holly Jolly Secrets (2)
episodes.overview: The Ice King summons an army of snowmen to recover the secret tapes Finn and Jake are watching. They must work against the clock to find out the secrets enclosed within.

episodes.title: Marceline's Closet
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake play Cloud Hunt in Marceline's house, but they get trapped in her closet after she comes home.

episodes.title: Paper Pete
episodes.overview: Library books seek help from Finn and Jake to save them from the evil Moldari.

episodes.title: Another Way
episodes.overview: Cyclops tears may heal Finn and Jake's broken toes.

episodes.title: Ghost Princess
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake play detective and try to solve Ghost Princess' murder.

episodes.title: Dad's Dungeon
episodes.overview: Jake's dad presents a strange challenge to the guys when he appears to them in a holographic message, telling them about a dungeon he made for them.

episodes.title: Incendium
episodes.overview: Jake embarks on a solo mission to help a broken-hearted Finn.

episodes.title: It Came from the Nightosphere
episodes.overview: Marceline's evil father goes on a soul-sucking rampage after Finn and Marceline accidentally release him from the Nightosphere.

episodes.title: The Eyes
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake try to rid themselves of a weird horse that creeps them out.

episodes.title: Loyalty to the King
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake are excited to meet the Nice King who has come to Ooo. They soon realize that he looks suspiciously like someone else they know; the Ice King.

episodes.title: Blood Under the Skin
episodes.overview: When Finn gets a splinter on his finger, he wants to get the best armor. In order to receive it, he must go on a quest to get the Magical Armor of Zelderon and survive one embarrassing situation after another.

episodes.title: Storytelling
episodes.overview: Jake is sick and demands to hear a good story full of romance, fighting and suspense.

episodes.title: Slow Love
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake agree to help a snail named Snorlock find a girlfriend.

episodes.title: Power Animal
episodes.overview: Finn is captured by gnomes who want to use his energy to power their infernal machines, and it's up to Jake to stay focused and rescue him.

episodes.title: Crystals Have Power
episodes.overview: Jake takes a pledge of nonviolence just before Finn is kidnapped by outlaws from the crystalline dimension.

episodes.title: The Other Tarts
episodes.overview: Finn choses to cross the Desert of Doom to deliver the royal tarts to the annual back rubbing ceremony.

episodes.title: To Cut a Woman's Hair
episodes.overview: A tree witch demands a lock of princess hair else Jake will be sucked into her bottomless bottom.

episodes.title: The Chamber of Frozen Blades
episodes.overview: Whilst the Ice King goes out to take Gunther to the hospital, Finn and Jake decide to sneak inside his lair and flex their ninja skills.

episodes.title: Her Parents
episodes.overview: Jake's relationship with Lady Rainicorn is in danger when he promises to meet with her parents, as both species had a long history of war with each other. However, thanks to Jake's shape-shifting powers, they mistake the dog as one of their own, but for how long?

episodes.title: The Pods
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake discover a box containing three beans. Planting them causes three pods to grow. Two of them are good and one is evil, but which is which?

episodes.title: The Silent King
episodes.overview: After defeating a evil king of goblins, Finn finds himself crowned as their new king. Unfortunately, he's unable to do anything for them due to the rules of the previous king including defending the goblins from the previous king.

episodes.title: The Real You
episodes.overview: Finn has to give a speech at Princess Bubblegum's science barbecue and seeks a quick fix to make himself smarter.

episodes.title: Guardians of Sunshine
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake get sucked into one of BMO's games and they have to defeat all three of his bosses.

episodes.title: Death in Bloom
episodes.overview: After killing Princess Bubblegum's plant when left to take care of it, Finn and Jake make a trip to the Land of the Dead in order to get it's soul back.

episodes.title: Susan Strong
episodes.overview: Finn is excited to discover what appears to be a tribe of humans living underground near the Candy Kingdom, but gets more than he expected when he tries to teach one of them about the surface world.

episodes.title: Mystery Train
episodes.overview: Wanting to surprise Finn on his birthday, Jake takes Finn on a train, where they get wrapped up in a murder mystery.

episodes.title: Go With Me
episodes.overview: Marceline and Jake give Finn advice so he can ask Princess Bubblegum to see a movie with him.

episodes.title: Belly of the Beast
episodes.overview: In order to cure the stomach ache of a giant, Finn and Jake must break up a party happening in his belly.

episodes.title: The Limit
episodes.overview: On a mission to save soldiers of the Hot Dog Princess, Finn and Jake go inside a massive maze where wishes can be granted and where Jake's stretching powers are pushed to their limits.

episodes.title: Video Makers
episodes.overview: After discovering government warnings prior to movies for their film club, Finn and Jake decide to make their own, but get into a fight over the direction of their film.

episodes.title: Mortal Folly (1)
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake must go on a quest to find the Lich King (originally sealed away by Billy), while the Ice King pesters them for permission to date Princess Bubblegum.

episodes.title: Mortal Recoil (2)
episodes.overview: The Princess isn't feeling well and Jake starts to worry something might be wrong with her.. The Ice King is anxious to help, but does Finn trust him?

episodes.title: Heat Signature
episodes.overview: Marceline plays a prank on Finn and Jake by making them believe they're vampires, but it nearly goes too far when they're manipulated by her ghost friends.

episodes.title: Slumber Party Panic
episodes.overview: Finn and Princess Bubblegum must protect the Candy Kingdom from a horde of candy zombies they accidentally created.

episodes.title: Trouble in Lumpy Space
episodes.overview: Finn must travel to Lumpy Space to find a cure that will save Jake, who was accidentally bitten by Lumpy Space Princess at a tea party.

episodes.title: Prisoners of Love
episodes.overview: When the Ice King kidnaps a number of princesses he sees as potential brides, Finn and Jake team with the prisoners to set everybody free.

episodes.title: Tree Trunks
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake join Tree Trunks in search for the rare Crystal Gem Apple, but question whether Tree Trunks has what it takes to adventure.

episodes.title: The Enchiridion!
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake go on a quest for a magical book that would prove them worthy of being righteous heroes.

episodes.title: The Jiggler
episodes.overview: A jiggly creature attracted by Finn's auto-tuned singing follows Finn and Jake home but soon feels ill effects of separation from its family.

episodes.title: Ricardio the Heart Guy
episodes.overview: When a Heart Guy named Ricardio comes to Candy Kingdom, Finn gets really jealous and finds a way to get him out of the Land of Ooo.

episodes.title: Business Time
episodes.overview: When Finn and Jake discover a group of businessmen frozen in an iceberg, the duo thaws them and hires them to help with their adventures.

episodes.title: My Two Favorite People
episodes.overview: Jake's plan to spend time with both Lady Rainicorn and Finn backfires.

episodes.title: Memories of Boom Boom Mountain
episodes.overview: Finn reflects on an upsetting experience in his past and pledges to help everyone in town, but this proves more difficult than imagined.

episodes.title: Wizard
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake temporarily get magic powers from an evil wizard, but are tricked into helping stop a comet.

episodes.title: Evicted!
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake search the land of Ooo for a new home after Marceline claims the duo's treehouse as her own.

episodes.title: City of Thieves
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake go off to face a thief king who has been stealing from little girls.

episodes.title: The Witch's Garden
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake consider breaking up after a witch strips Jake of his powers.

episodes.title: What is Life?
episodes.overview: Finn brings a pie-throwing robot to life, but the machine begins to long for a more fulfilling existence.

episodes.title: Ocean of Fear
episodes.overview: Finn struggles to overcome his fear of the ocean.

episodes.title: When Wedding Bells Thaw
episodes.overview: The Ice King gets married but not before he convinces Finn and Jake to throw him a manlorette party.

episodes.title: Dungeon
episodes.overview: Finn's headstrong decision to explore a dungeon in defiance of Jake's warnings leads to a dangerous escapade.

episodes.title: The Duke
episodes.overview: Finn must tell the truth when he accidentally turns Princess Bubblegum bald and green and blames the Duke of Nuts.

episodes.title: Freak City
episodes.overview: After being transformed into a foot, Finn joins forces with a band of misfits to make things right.

episodes.title: Donny
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake try to help an obnoxious grass ogre named Donny develop better social skills, only to find out Donny's jerky behavior protects the house people from the why-wolves, which eat the house people.

episodes.title: Henchman
episodes.overview: After seeing Marceline the vampire queen torment an elderly henchman, Finn steps in to be her new henchman, doing whatever he is told to do.

episodes.title: Rainy Day Daydream
episodes.overview: Stuck inside the treehouse due to a knife storm, Finn and Jake use their imagination to pass the time.

episodes.title: What Have You Done?
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake capture the Ice King as their prisoner, but feel guilty when unable to explain the wrongs he committed.

episodes.title: His Hero
episodes.overview: The great warrior Billy inspires Finn and Jake to practice nonviolence, but the duo finds it difficult to resist old ways.

episodes.title: Gut Grinder
episodes.overview: When the Fluffy People's gold has been devoured by a culprit only known as "The Gut Grinder", Finn and Jake team up to find him with his tracks.

episodes.title: Adventure Time (Pilot)
episodes.overview: Princess Bubblegum is imprisoned by the Ice King. Jake and Finn battle their way past the Iceclops, Snow Golem, and other monsters that inhabit the Ice Kingdom to rescue her.

episodes.title: The Wand
episodes.overview: Finn and Jake come across a magic wand, but when the wand becomes uncontrollable, they must team up with the Ice King to stop it.
